poem:
"In the Arms of History"

Malaysia, the storm wove you,
From the warp of East and West,
In the loom of 1935.
Human threads, tangled in Hope and turmoil,
Your pattern emerges - a saga.
Chan, from a foreign shore,
Draws her needle through this cloth,
Gives life to silent histories,
And threads together the storm we made.
